description: Creates a new Amazon Redshift security group. You use security groups to control access to non-VPC clusters. For information about managing security groups, go to Amazon Redshift Cluster Security Groups in the Amazon Redshift Cluster Management Guide.

parameters.name: ClusterSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The name for the security group. Amazon Redshift stores the value as a lowercase string. Constraints: Must contain no more than 255 alphanumeric characters or hyphens. Must not be 'Default'. Must be unique for all security groups that are created by your Amazon Web Services account. Example: examplesecuritygroup.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description for the security group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tag instances. (dict) --- A tag consisting of a name/value pair for a resource. Key (string) --- The key, or name, for the resource tag. Value (string) --- The value for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: ClusterSecurityGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the cluster security group to which the operation was applied.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the security group.

nested_items.name: EC2SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: A list of EC2 security groups that are permitted to access clusters associated with this cluster security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the EC2 security group.

nested_items.name: EC2SecurityGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the EC2 Security Group.

nested_items.name: EC2SecurityGroupOwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the owner of the EC2 security group specified in the EC2SecurityGroupName field.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tags for the EC2 security group.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: IPRanges
nested_items.description: A list of IP ranges (CIDR blocks) that are permitted to access clusters associated with this cluster security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the IP range, for example, 'authorized'.

nested_items.name: CIDRIP
nested_items.description: The IP range in Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) notation.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tags for the IP range.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tags for the cluster security group.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key, or name, for the resource tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the resource tag.
